title: General Configuration
prop_num_judges: Default Judges to vote in Competitions

qr_tooltip: Show the event QR to share the link
event_status_modal_msg_finish: Are you sure you want to mark this event as finished?
event_status_modal_msg_open: Are you sure you want to open this event?
event_status_finish_info_title: By marking the event as finished:
event_status_finish_detail_1: Judges will no longer be able to submit votes
event_status_finish_detail_2: Master data, judges, dancers, and competitions can no longer be modified
event_status_finish_detail_3: An email will be sent to the dancers with their access code for statistics
event_status_finish_detail_4: If schools registered inscriptions, all audio files uploaded to the platform will be permanently deleted

visibility_modal_hide_event: Are you sure you want to hide the event?
